title: Who Are the First Traitors in Season 3?
description: Discover the initial Traitors in Traitors Season 3. Uncover their identities now! The post Who Are the First Traitors in Season 3? appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Ritika Singh
excerpt: Get ready to uncover the hidden traitors in Traitors Season 3. Find out who will betray the contestants in this intense reality competition.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: The much-awaited series Traitors Season 3 is finally here! The season showcases a group of contestants engaging in numerous challenges at a castle. However, to win the cash prize, they must uncover three traitors in the team who are secretly working to sabotage their efforts. With the first three episodes of the new season now out, fans are buzzing with one question: Who are the first traitors in Traitors Season 3? Here is a list of all the traitors in the fresh season of this thrilling reality competition series. Season 3’s first batch of Traitors listed Below is the list of the first batch of Traitors in Traitors Season 3: Danielle Reyes: She has gained fame as the runner-up in Big Brother Season 3 and later returned for the show’s seventh season and Big Brother: Reindeer Games. Host Alan Cumming chose her as the first Traitor of Season 3 during the roundtable. In her confessional, Danielle excitedly embraced her new role, saying, “I’ve never been so happy to be so bad.” Carolyn Wiger: Carolyn was chosen as the second Traitor at the first roundtable. She was visibly thrilled by the selection, especially given her emotional interview with Alan Cumming beforehand. Carolyn is a familiar face from Survivor Season 44, where she displayed a deeply emotional personality. It will be intriguing to see if she can suppress her emotions and embrace the cutthroat role of a Traitor. Bob The Drag Queen: Bob the Drag Queen is a fan favorite, having won RuPaul’s Drag Race Season 8. In his confessional, he hinted at his strategic mindset, saying he is ready to be the “employee of the month.” His bold and dramatic personality has fans eager to see how he will leverage his charisma to manipulate the other players. “Boston” Rob Mariano: A major twist occurred when Survivor legend Rob Mariano, famously known as “Boston Rob,” joined the game. He was introduced at the first roundtable but left when the group didn’t invite him to stay. In Episode 3, he made a shocking return as the fourth Traitor. Known for his strategic skills in Survivor, Rob is a strong addition to the Traitor team. His presence is sure to shake things up. This first group of Traitors is already stirring up chaos. Fans are eager to see how their cunning plans unfold in the coming weeks!
html:
The much-awaited series Traitors Season 3 is finally here! The season showcases a group of contestants engaging in numerous challenges at a castle. However, to win the cash prize, they must uncover three traitors in the team who are secretly working to sabotage their efforts. With the first three episodes of the new season now out, fans are buzzing with one question: Who are the first traitors in Traitors Season 3?

Here is a list of all the traitors in the fresh season of this thrilling reality competition series.

Season 3’s first batch of Traitors listed

Below is the list of the first batch of Traitors in Traitors Season 3:

  • Danielle Reyes: She has gained fame as the runner-up in Big Brother Season 3 and later returned for the show’s seventh season and Big Brother: Reindeer Games. Host Alan Cumming chose her as the first Traitor of Season 3 during the roundtable. In her confessional, Danielle excitedly embraced her new role, saying, “I’ve never been so happy to be so bad.”
  • Carolyn Wiger: Carolyn was chosen as the second Traitor at the first roundtable. She was visibly thrilled by the selection, especially given her emotional interview with Alan Cumming beforehand. Carolyn is a familiar face from Survivor Season 44, where she displayed a deeply emotional personality. It will be intriguing to see if she can suppress her emotions and embrace the cutthroat role of a Traitor.
  • Bob The Drag Queen: Bob the Drag Queen is a fan favorite, having won RuPaul’s Drag Race Season 8. In his confessional, he hinted at his strategic mindset, saying he is ready to be the “employee of the month.” His bold and dramatic personality has fans eager to see how he will leverage his charisma to manipulate the other players.
  • “Boston” Rob Mariano: A major twist occurred when Survivor legend Rob Mariano, famously known as “Boston Rob,” joined the game. He was introduced at the first roundtable but left when the group didn’t invite him to stay. In Episode 3, he made a shocking return as the fourth Traitor. Known for his strategic skills in Survivor, Rob is a strong addition to the Traitor team. His presence is sure to shake things up.

This first group of Traitors is already stirring up chaos. Fans are eager to see how their cunning plans unfold in the coming weeks!
